panels.description: Note that this will only show servers which have been active in period - if the server has not woken up then it will not be shown.

panels.description:
Number of loaded chunks is on left-hand axis

Number of new chunks generated by the game is on the right-hand axis - new chunks are generated by the game if new parts of the world are visited.
